config.sql: SELECT CASE WHEN C.SCODE IS NULL THEN B.SCODE ELSE C.SCODE END AS SCODE,B.SCODE AS PID,B.SNAME AS GSMC,(CASE WHEN C.SNAME IS NULL THEN 'SH' ELSE C.SNAME END) AS YHZHMC,FACT_A AS HBZJ,FACT_B AS YHCK,FACT_C AS JZJE, CASE WHEN(NVL(FACT_B,0)+NVL(FACT_C,0))=0 THEN 0 ELSE (NVL(FACT_C,0)/(NVL(FACT_B,0)+NVL(FACT_C,0))) END AS JZD FROM DW_FACTCAPITALDETAIL A INNER JOIN DW_DIMCOMPANY B ON A.DIM_COMPANY=B.SCODE AND DIM_PERIOD='201711' LEFT JOIN DW_DIMBANK C ON A.DIM_BANK=C.SCODE WHERE B.SCODE IN (SELECT SCODE FROM DW_DIMCOMPANY WHERE (SCODE='10010301' OR SPCODE LIKE '10010301%') AND CISDEL = 'N' AND CTYPE='1') AND B.SCODE NOT IN (SELECT SCODE FROM DW_DIMCOMPANY WHERE CTYPE='0') ORDER BY B.SCODE,DIM_BANK DESC
